Questions.title: Question 1
Questions.content: What sport does the young Harry Potter practice while studying at Hogwarts?

Questions.title: Question 2
Questions.content: Which of these houses does not belong to Hogwarts?

Questions.title: Question 3
Questions.content: What spell can levitate an object?

Question 4.title: Question 4
Question 4.content: Who is the director of Hogwarts in the first year of Harry Potter?

Questions.content: What is so special about Neville Longbottom?
answers: He was not invited to school
He uses an umbrella to do magic
He always forgets what he has to do
He flies upside down on his broom
